content: And that's what that's valid for everyone that operates in that market, in our case specific case, in the corporates business, we changed the mix going into the better ratings, very active portfolio management that started off with BBA in the beginning of 2015, 2016, we changed how we managed the portfolio and now we're reaping the results of very healthy portfolio, great ratings, very strong results in all the lines that you can generate from your customers and at the same rate, low cost of credit and low bad debt.
